# Importing Census Data


```{r}






```


```{r}


Sys.getenv("CENSUS_API_KEY")

```


```{r}


pop_2020<-load_variables(2020,"pl",cache=TRUE)



```


```{r}


ma_county_pop <- get_decennial(
  geography = "county",
  state = "MA",
  variables = "P1_001N",
  year=2020
)


```


```{r}

ma_county_pop



```


```{r}


saveRDS(ma_county_pop, "ma_county_pop.rds")


```

```{r}


ma_county_pop <- readRDS("ma_county_pop")


```
